title: [Yegharren Plain, Trees]
description: A raised mound of earth provides root for a clump of hardy trees and temporary shelter for many passing creatures, judging by the number of foot and claw prints and the scratch-marked trunks.  A variety of colorful birds perch in the branches above, chirping and singing in a chaotic chorale.

A raised mound of earth provides root for a clump of hardy trees and temporary shelter for many passing creatures, judging by the number of foot and claw prints and the scratch-marked trunks.  Several night-dwelling birds perch in the branches above, filling the darkness with their mournful song.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
